Posts.Content: i liked your sense of humor...I am writing to just to let you know,,,,never give up hope,,,,,,I have every faith in this new radio wave technology that will be coming into use very soon....and its not the radio ablation that has been used already..I will keep you informed about this new and startling treament possibility,that has the potential to wipe out cancer,,,harmlessly,w/o drugs...so keep up the faith,and God bless.
Posts.Title: Good news/ bad news
